definition: to wash/to rinse/any of three 10-day division of the month (during Tang dynasty)/Taiwan pr. [huan3]/also pr. [wan3]

sentences.english: Mrs. Raccoon watched Chester scamper across a tree limb and enter school.
sentences.chinese: 浣熊妈妈看着奇奇跳过树枝，进入学校。

sentences.english: If you want to catch a raccoon, show him a shiny object to distract him.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想抓一只浣熊，拿些亮的东西分散它的专注力。

sentences.english: The NW edge of the subtropical ridge retreated a bit last night.
sentences.chinese: 影响浣熊的副热带高压脊西北沿于昨晚稍稍东退。

sentences.english: The hedge shook as he tangled with the hound.
sentences.chinese: 它和猎浣熊犬撕扯时，树篱晃个不停。

sentences.english: Wildlife Deer Wolf Eagle Racoon Cross …
sentences.chinese: 野生动物的鹿狼鹰浣熊两岸。

sentences.english: This tape, work of former Raccoon 7 anchorwoman Terri Morales.
sentences.chinese: 这盘带子，是前浣熊市7频道主播泰瑞莫拉斯拍摄的。

sentences.english: Typhoon Neoguri affected Hong Kong, it broke lots of record .
sentences.chinese: 台风浣熊袭港，创下多个纪录。

sentences.english: HKO assessed Neoguri weakened into a tropical storm before making landfall on Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 天文台指浣熊在登陆广东前减弱为热带风暴。

sentences.english: There was only one thing wrong. I didn't have a big coonskin to add to my collection.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的遗憾是，我的收藏里没有一张大大的浣熊皮。

sentences.english: Always quiet Fu's small coon in it quickly the shoulder bag the inside peeped out head.
sentences.chinese: 一直静伏在之敏背包里的小浣熊露出了脑袋。

sentences.english: "I'm thinking of trying a raccoon next time, " she said.
sentences.chinese: “我在想下次应该试一下浣熊，”她说。

sentences.english: The ones that fascinated me the most were the baby-like tracks of a river coon.
sentences.chinese: 其中最吸引我的是一种河浣熊留下的婴儿似的脚印。

sentences.english: The most common type is Coonhound paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的类型是猎浣熊犬瘫痪。

sentences.english: Here is the one of the raccoon.
Kassel remains the capital city of raccoon expansionism in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 卡塞尔仍然是欧洲浣熊扩散的主要城市。

definition: aardwolf (Proteles cristatus), a small insectivorous relative of the hyena
